channel.title: Getting a forum like this one's
channel.description: Hey there. I have seen multiple forums like these ones, such as the Raging Coder's Forum and I was wondering how to get one. My friend got one last night, and I want my own now. So will someone be kind enough to tell me?

item.title: Getting a forum like this one's
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Okay. Thanks. Youre da bomb![br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 10:28:48 PM[/size][hr]Made one!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Getting a forum like this one's
